snippet: What skills or attitudes do you think you and your peers have that people your parents’ age could benefit from adopting?
abstract: What skills or attitudes do you think you and your peers have that people your parents’ age could benefit from adopting?
lead_paragraph: In an article currently on the most emailed list, a baby boomer describes how his 25-year-old son does what he loves, even if it doesn’t earn him much money. His son’s life, he writes, is making him rethink how “success” might be measured.

headline.main: What Can Older People Learn From Your Generation?
